What We Deliver

Comprehensive cold chain solutions designed for the most demanding pharmaceutical and biotech requirements.

Cell & Gene Therapy

Specialized handling and transport for advanced therapeutic products requiring precise temperature control.

Bio-Sample Transport

Secure collection, packaging, and delivery of biological samples for research and clinical applications.

Clinical Trial Logistics

End-to-end logistics support for clinical trial materials with full traceability and compliance.

Pharmaceutical Distribution

Reliable distribution network for temperature-sensitive pharmaceutical products worldwide.

Vaccine Handling

Specialized cold chain solutions for vaccine storage, transport, and distribution.

Global Freight Support

Worldwide freight services with real-time monitoring and regulatory compliance.

Certifications & Standards

GDP Compliance

Good Distribution Practice for pharmaceutical products

GxP Standards

Good Practice guidelines for pharmaceutical manufacturing

Our Commitment to Excellence

TailorMed maintains the highest standards of regulatory compliance and quality assurance. Our comprehensive audit trail, real-time monitoring capabilities, and certified processes ensure that every shipment meets the strictest pharmaceutical and biotech industry requirements.

Our Process

A systematic approach to cold chain logistics that ensures product integrity and regulatory compliance.

01

Inquiry

Initial consultation to understand your specific requirements and regulatory needs.

02

Planning

Custom logistics plan development with risk assessment and compliance mapping.

03

Packaging

Specialized packaging solutions with validated temperature control systems.

04

Delivery

Secure transport with real-time monitoring and chain of custody documentation.

05

Monitoring

Continuous tracking and reporting throughout the entire logistics journey.
